Html:
Hi there,

I have an Excel file that contains several tab sheets, named like this: HUN-CZE, HUN-FRA, FRA-ENG and so on. I load the file using this code:

IExcelDataReader excelReader = ExcelReaderFactory.CreateBinaryReader(stream);
DataSet result = excelReader.AsDataSet();

But the resulting dataset contains only one tab sheet, named "Sheet 1".

What am I doing wrong?

Regards,

-Eduardo
Please let me know if you get any answer this is some thing what i am looking for also.

There is a discussion related to this on the github site
https://github.com/ExcelDataReader/ExcelDataReader/issues/27

Please feel free to add to that discussion
